patthana8.47:4.1: Naupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana8.47:5.1: Naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.47:5.2: Naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.47:5.3: Naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno ca naanupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.47:6.1: Naupādinnañca naanupādinnañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.47:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
